# Testing owl:TransitiveProperty (prp-trans)

PREFIX bbc:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/bbc/>  
PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX sport:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/sport/> 
PREFIX core:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/coreconcepts/> 
PREFIX cwork:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/creativework/> 
PREFIX ldbc:<http://www.ldbc.eu/ontologies/sempub#>

INSERT DATA 
{
<http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-1#id> a sport:SportsDiscipline ; 
	rdfs:comment "Testing owl:TransitiveProperty (prp-trp) (1)"  ; 
        sport:subDiscipline <http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-2#id> . 

<http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-2#id> a sport:SportsDiscipline ;
	rdfs:comment "Testing owl:TransitiveProperty (prp-trp) (2)" ; 
        sport:subDiscipline <http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-3#id> .

<http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-3#id> a sport:SportsDiscipline ;
	rdfs:comment "Testing owl:TransitiveProperty (prp-trp) (3)" ; 
        sport:subDiscipline <http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-4#id> .

<http://www.bbc.co.uk/sports/sportsdiscipline-prp-trp-4#id> a sport:SportsDiscipline .
}
